title: Happy Organic September!
article: Make the switch to organic soaps this September with out rich, natural & wholesome soap, fragranced with only pure essential oils.

title: All-natural handmade soap. created in the cotswodds
article: The Cotsworlds is where our products were born, and our story began. Follow our journey from the kitchen table to the supermarket shelf.

title: We've been awarded The Queens Award!
article: Eliminate unnecessary plastic bottles with our innovative Eco Warrior range. Functional bars to cleanse from head to toe

title: Introducing our B Corp Impact Report!
article: Read our latest report where we'll take you through what we have done, and continue to do for the planet, for nature & communities.

title: Eco Bathroom. Join the Revolution.
article: Packed full of blogs, giveaways and inspiration. Eco Bathroom is your new favorite one stop eco shop. The bathroom is a space where small changes can make a big difference
